phones.description: Introducing Dell™ Streak 7. Share photos, videos and movies together. It’s small enough to carry around, big enough to gather around.

phones.description: The Samsung Gem™ brings you everything that you would expect and more from a touch display smart phone – more apps, more features and a more affordable price.

phones.description: Fast just got faster with Nexus S. A pure Google experience, Nexus S is the first phone to run Gingerbread (Android 2.3), the fastest version of Android yet.

phones.description: Android Powered, Google Maps Navigation, 5 Customizable Home Screens

phones.description: Feel Free to Tab™. The Samsung Galaxy Tab™ brings you an ultra-mobile entertainment experience through its 7” display, high-power processor and Adobe® Flash® Player compatibility.

phones.name: SANYO ZIO
phones.description: The Sanyo Zio by Kyocera is an Android smartphone with a combination of ultra-sleek styling, strong performance and unprecedented value.

phones.description: The Samsung Transform™ brings you a fun way to customize your Android powered touch screen phone to just the way you like it through your favorite themed “Sprint ID Service Pack”.

phones.name: T-Mobile G2
phones.description: The T-Mobile G2 with Google is the first smartphone built for 4G speeds on T-Mobile's new network. Get the information you need, faster than you ever thought possible.
